content.question: Which of the following artists did Bernini acknowledge as being the most influential on his depiction of the human form?

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.3: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Explain the influence of a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) on other artistic production within or across cultures.
